verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H3543>dim,<s%> so that he could not <S%H7200>see,<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, My <S%H1121>son:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> here am I.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I am <S%H2204>old,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H4194>death:<s%>

Now therefore <S%H5375>take,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, your <S%H3627>weapons,<s%> your <S%H8522>quiver<s%> and your <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H6679>take<s%> me some <S%H6720>venison;<s%>

And <S%H6213>make<s%> me <S%H4303>savoury<s%> meat, such as I <S%H157>love,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to me, that I may <S%H398>eat;<s%> that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%> And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and to <S%H935>bring<s%> it.

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H935>Bring<s%> me <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> me <S%H4303>savoury<s%> meat, that I may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> my <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Now therefore, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

<S%H3212>Go<s%> now to the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> me from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1423>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H4303>savoury<s%> meat for your <S%H1>father,<s%> such as he <S%H157>loves:<s%>
And you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to your <S%H1>father,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and that he may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> is a <S%H8163>hairy<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and I am a <S%H2509>smooth<s%> <S%H376>man:<s%>

My <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> will <S%H4959>feel<s%> me, and I shall <S%H1961>seem<s%> <S%H5869><s%> to him as a <S%H8591>deceiver;<s%> and I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> on me, and not a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

And his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, On me be your <S%H7045>curse,<s%> my <S%H1121>son:<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H3947>fetch<s%> me them.

And he <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to his <S%H517>mother:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4303>savoury<s%> meat, such as his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved.<s%>

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2530>goodly<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> of her <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> which were with her in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son:<s%>
And she <S%H3847>put<s%> the <S%H5785>skins<s%> of the <S%H1423>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> on his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and on the <S%H2513>smooth<s%> of his <S%H6677>neck:<s%>

And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4303>savoury<s%> meat and the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H6213>prepared,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
And he <S%H935>came<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H1>father:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I; <S%H4310>who<s%> are you, my <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> I am <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your first <S%H1060>born;<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> according as you <S%H1696>bade<s%> me: <S%H6965>arise,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H6718>venison,<s%> that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> me.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> is it that you have <S%H4672>found<s%> it so <S%H4116>quickly,<s%> my <S%H1121>son?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>brought<s%> it to me.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H5066>Come<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> you, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> whether you be my <S%H2088>very<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> or not.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5066>went<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and he <S%H4959>felt<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> but the <S%H3027>hands<s%> are the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

And he <S%H5234>discerned<s%> him not, <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H8163>hairy,<s%> as his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H3027>hands:<s%> so he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Are you my <S%H2088>very<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I am.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5066>Bring<s%> it <S%H5066>near<s%> to me, and I will <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H6718>venison,<s%> that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you. And he <S%H5066>brought<s%> it <S%H5066>near<s%> to him, and he did <S%H398>eat:<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> him wine <S%H3196><s%>and he <S%H8354>drank.<s%>
And his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5066>Come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me, my <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And he <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him: and he <S%H7306>smelled<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of his <S%H899>raiment,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> is as the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed:<s%>

Therefore <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you of the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7230>plenty<s%> of <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine:<s%>

Let <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> you, and <S%H3816>nations<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to you: be <S%H1376>lord<s%> over your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and let your <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to you: <S%H779>cursed<s%> be every one that <S%H779>curses<s%> you, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be he that <S%H1288>blesses<s%> you.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as <S%H834>soon<s%> as <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H389>yet<s%> scarce <S%H3318>gone<s%> out from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> that <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in from his <S%H6718>hunting.<s%>

And he <S%H1571>also<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4303>savoury<s%> meat, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> Let my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H6718>venison,<s%> that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> me.
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4310>Who<s%> are you? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I am your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%> <S%H1419>very<s%> <S%H1419>exceedingly,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who?<s%> <S%H645>where<s%> is he that has <S%H6679>taken<s%> <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it me, and I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> you <S%H935>came,<s%> and have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him? <S%H1571>yes,<s%> and he shall be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

And when <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> he <S%H6817>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H6818>cry,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> me, <S%H1571>even<s%> me <S%H1571>also,<s%> O my <S%H1>father.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H4820>subtlety,<s%> and has <S%H3947>taken<s%> away your <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is not he <S%H3588>rightly<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob?<s%> for he has <S%H6117>supplanted<s%> me <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H6471>two<s%> <S%H6471>times:<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> away my <S%H1062>birthright;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> he has <S%H3947>taken<s%> away my <S%H1293>blessing.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Have you not <S%H680>reserved<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> for me?

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> him your <S%H1376>lord,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> to him for <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and with <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine<s%> have I <S%H5564>sustained<s%> him: and <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> to you, my <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> Have you but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> my <S%H1>father?<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> me, <S%H1571>even<s%> me <S%H1571>also,<s%> O my <S%H1>father.<s%> And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> shall be the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and of the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> from <S%H5921>above;<s%>

And by your <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall you <S%H2421>live,<s%> and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H251>brother;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass <S%H834>when<s%> you shall have the <S%H7300>dominion,<s%> that you shall <S%H6561>break<s%> his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> your <S%H6677>neck.<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7852>hated<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him: and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%> for my <S%H1>father<s%> are <S%H7128>at<s%> <S%H7126>hand;<s%> then will I <S%H2026>slay<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And these <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> her <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> were <S%H5608>told<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah:<s%> and she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> as touching you, does <S%H5162>comfort<s%> himself, purposing to <S%H2026>kill<s%> you.
<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> you to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H2771>Haran;<s%>
And <S%H3427>tarry<s%> with him a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> away;

<S%H5704>Until<s%> your <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> away from you, and he <S%H7911>forget<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to him: then I will <S%H7971>send,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> you from <S%H8033>there:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> should I be <S%H7921>deprived<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of you <S%H8147>both<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%>

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> I am <S%H6973>weary<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> such as <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> good shall my <S%H2416>life<s%> do me?
